text:
Summary says it all, really. Passthrough of JSPs to tomcat via mod_jk
doesn't understand that the servlet spec permits the appending of a
session ID onto the end of the request URI.

src/native/mod_jk/common/jk_uri_worker_map.c, map_uri_to_worker needs fixing;
we've got a hacky workaround in place at the moment but general public paranoia
about cookies makes this a bit of a show-stopper.

Cheers.
